participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and open, Emily enjoys engaging in conversations about her interests and experiences.
participant_1.background: my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey. i live is a rural farming community. i've a german shepherd dog.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Motivated and inspiring, David is always looking to uplift others with his positive outlook on life.
participant_2.background: i am a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach.
